Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Disrespectful \Dis`re*spect"ful\, a. Wanting in respect; manifesting disesteem or lack of respect; uncivil; as, disrespectful behavior. -- {Dis`re*spect"ful*ly}, adv. -- {Dis`re*spect"ful*ness}, n. [1913 Webster]

disrespectful adj 1: exhibiting lack of respect; rude and discourteous; "remarks disrespectful of the law"; "disrespectful in the presence of his parents"; "disrespectful toward his teacher" [ant: {respectful}] 2: neither feeling nor showing respect [syn: {aweless}, {awless}]
